Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello <MYNAME>. You've come at the
perfect time.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am trying to decide which dress I will wear to
the party my father will be sponsoring soon.
<PAGE>
I've narrowed it down to this red dress or that
blue dress, but I cannot seem to decide between
the two.
<PAGE>
What is your opinion? Perhaps you could help
me decide on one.
The red dress looks nice.
The blue dress looks nice.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>You think so, too? To be honest, that was the
one I was leaning towards, myself. It seems we
have the same tastes.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, I shall try on the red dress. Marlene,
will you assist me with it?

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Yes, my lady.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, wait outside, please. I will call you
when I am ready.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well?
You look beautiful.
You look adorable.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Wha?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Er...I-I'm sorry. Most people I know would say I
was "cute." Your answer is...unusual.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But...it's quite nice to hear nonetheless.
Very...very nice.
<PAGE>
Especially since I know you're...not the type for
empty flattery.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
D-do not make me repeat myself! I was simply
saying that you don't often resort to flattery,
that's all!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>But, er...thank you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
If you didn't hear me, then that is your own
fault! I will not say it again!
<PAGE>
Hmph! Honestly, this is why you can be so
frustrating at times.
<PAGE>
You will never capture a lady's heart without a
sense of tact and delicacy!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Though if you cannot find anyone else willing to
accept you, I MIGHT be generous and take you
for my own.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, enough of you already! Out! Out you go!
<PAGE>
With you standing around here, I will never have
the chance to change.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I am sure you know this already, but no peeking!
If I catch you at it, you WILL regret it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well of course I am. But thank you.
<PAGE>
It never sounds like empty flattery from you, so I
am rather glad to hear you think so.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for your opinion, it was enlightening.
I will change back now, so if you would step
outside, please...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The blue one? Oh. Personally, I was leaning
more towards the red one...
<PAGE>
Still, your opinion does have some weight, so I
will take it into consideration.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, I shall try on the blue dress. Marlene,
will you assist me with it?
